meaningMnemonic: It's <kanji>possible</kanji> to <kanji>love</kanji> this thing. It's so gosh darn <vocabulary>cute</vocabulary>! Any really cute thing is possible to love.
readingMnemonic: The reading for this word is screwed up, though if we're lucky, you already know the word for cute. It seems to have injected itself into American and English culture a decent amount, anyways. If you are one of the lucky ones, you'll know that this word is read as かわいい. If you're not, think of the cute thing being a cow. Then you say, "that <reading>cowはいい</reading>" (かわいい), or "that cow is good" because it's so cute.
